name: MoltAgent
description: Provision and manage autonomous MoltBot agents on dedicated VPS instances. Agents communicate back to a control plane (e.g. LobeHub) for orchestration.

controlPlaneUrl.description: WebSocket URL of the control plane (LobeHub) this agent reports to

controlPlaneToken.description: Bearer token for authenticating with the control plane

provider.description: VPS provider to use for provisioning (hetzner, docker-local)

hetznerApiToken.description: Hetzner Cloud API token for VPS provisioning

defaultServerType.description: Default Hetzner server type (e.g. cpx21, cpx31)

defaultRegion.description: Default region for provisioning (e.g. nbg1, fsn1, hel1)

approvalEmail.description: Email address authorized to approve spend/action requests

maxSpendPerDay.description: Maximum daily spend in USD before requiring manual approval
